https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ulym4cSPbRtsg3z3Xlz8ISSNUgc.jpg In this humanistic comedy, set against the backdrop of economic crises and bad news, an extravagant international cast of characters meet, fight, and fall in love, while hiding from the end of the world and other calamities on the tiny Greek island of Khronos.
